room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: I very highly recommend Adventure Rooms in Montclair, NJ! I've been there twice and had so much fun both times! I love that you are able to have a private room. My husband and I did it the first time and we brought our daughter the second time. All of us absolutely LOVED it! We can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: My family and I had a great time. We made no reservations yet they had one open room and where able to take us right in. We will be back for another try.

room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in New York
review: I've been here 3 times. Great place especially if you're a beginner. The puzzles aren't too crazy. You definitely have to think outside of the box though. It would be a lot of fun for all ages. I love how the bookings are private. That's not something most escape rooms allow. I'll definitely return when they change their themes.
